rows.segment_description: The Mac segment consists of Apple's line of personal computers. According to the provided text, net sales of Mac increased during 2025 compared to 2024, contributing to overall company performance. This segment is specifically referenced in the net sales breakdown by category.
rows.text_snippet: Phone, partially offset by higher net sales of Mac. Japan Japan net sales increased during 2025 compared to 2024 primarily due to higher net sales of iPhone, Services and iPad. Rest of Asia Pacific Rest of Asia Pacific net sales increased during 2025 compared to 2024 primarily due to higher net sales of iPhone, Services and Mac. Apple Inc. | 2025 Form 10-K | 22 Products and Services Performance The following table shows net sales by category for 2025, 2024 and 2023 (dollars in millions): 2025 Change 2024 Change 2023 iPhone $ 209,586 4 % $ 201,183 — % $ 200,583 Mac 33,708 12 % 29,984 2 % 29,357 iPad 28,023 5 % 26,694 (6) % 28,300 Wearables, Home and Accessories 35,686 (4) % 37,005 (7) % 39,845 Services (1) 109,158 14 % 96,169 13 % 85,200 Total net sales $ 416,161 6 % $ 391,035 2 % $ 383,285
